caption:
It’s NEVER too late to chase your goals! 🏃🏾‍♀️💙 At 79 years young, Mildred Baker just ran her first-ever half marathon! 🙌🏾 She started her journey with NYRR Striders, a free fitness program for older adults, and has since completed 14 races—proving that passion and perseverance know no age.⁠
⁠
A #MondayMotivation reminder that it’s never too late to start, grow, and achieve something amazing. Whatever your goal is, take that first step—you just might surprise yourself.⁠
⁠
Follow @officialblackwallstreet for more Black excellence and Black-owned businesses. ✨️
